FuncDef: The display license cloud server command is used to view the registration information of devices and cloud license servers.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After configuring the cloud license server of the device, this command is used to view the registration information of the device and the cloud license server to determine whether the registration is successful.
Precautions
Please configure the IP address and port number of the cloud license server first, otherwise no information will be displayed.
